niagara.physical
Class AtomicKey

java.lang.Object
  niagara.physical.AtomicKey

 class AtomicKey
extends java.lang.Object

Implementation AtomicKey class which represents the smallest unit of a key - that is one path and how to match on that path (i.e. content at the end of that path, tag existence, etc.) A list of AtomicKeys makes a LocalKey.
